topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: OS distribution :: Live CD

name: Ultimate Mint Live - Cinnamon -
short_description:
This "Ultimate Mint Live" release is based on linux Mint 17 Qiana Cinnamon 32-bit and 64-bit edition,but bundled with extra software that doesn't come in a standard edition. Purpose of this release is to work as a Live operating sistem, and have all software packages already preinstalled and ready for use straight out-of-box. You can carry it on a USB flash drive and use it on every computer. If you want- you can even install it on your hard drive, and all preinstalled software packages from Live edition will be transfered on your hard drive too. Detailed instruction about transfering this .ISO on USB flash drive and installation info can be found in provided README.txt file. This edition is built for personal purposes but it can be used on every PC or laptop with 32-bit or 64-bit CPU. System itself and all preinstalled software are on their default settings (you can customize it later if you want to). 
This is an unofficial release and not part of official Linux Mint project.
summary: Unofficial "ultimate edition" of linux Mint 17 Qiana
